Uses of Class
asteroids.game.Controller

  • Packages that use Controller 
    Package Description
    asteroids.game
    This package contains the high-level classes that coordinate the appearance and operation of the game.
    asteroids.participants
    All of the classes in this package extend the abstract Participant class to define a new kind of participant in the game.

    • Uses of Controller in asteroids.game

      Fields in asteroids.game declared as Controller 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Controller Screen.controller
      Game controller
      Constructors in asteroids.game with parameters of type Controller 
      Constructor Description
      Display​(Controller controller)
      Lays out the game and creates the controller
      Screen​(Controller controller)
      Creates an empty screen

    • Uses of Controller in asteroids.participants

      Fields in asteroids.participants declared as Controller 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Controller Asteroid.controller
      The game controller
      private Controller Ship.controller
      Game controller
      Constructors in asteroids.participants with parameters of type Controller 
      Constructor Description
      Asteroid​(int variety, int size, double x, double y, int speed, Controller controller)
      Throws an IllegalArgumentException if size or variety is out of range.
      Ship​(int x, int y, double direction, Controller controller)
      Constructs a ship at the specified coordinates that is pointed in the given direction.
